cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about context modeling and response generation in open domain conversation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Specifically, the paper proposes an unsupervised context rewriting method using a neural network with reinforcement learning. This work involves techniques from machine learning, deep learning, and NLP, which are covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics related to NLP and machine learning. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), which also cover relevant topics in this paper.
